page.title: 10A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: On a Monday I usually get up at 7-0'clock.After brushing my hair I have a wash.As we go swimming on a Monday I get my swimming things ready the night before.After a wash,I dress, have my breakfast,usually rice- crispies.The taxi takes us from the top of our track to school. At 9-0'clock we have Assembly and at 9.30am.we go to Aireville Swimming Baths in Skipton.When we arrive back we do Maths until dinner-time. Some people bring a packed lunch but I have a school dinner.My favourite meal is sausages and chips with shortcake and custard to follow. If the weather is good we go to the Recreation Ground to play.We also have sewing until play-time.After play-time we carry on for a while then our teacher reads us 'Heidi' until home- time.
